div.p: Earlier this afternoon, Governor Dewine announced that schools will remain closed for the rest of the school year. In anticipation of that information, we had already scheduled a tentative administrative team meeting to discuss our priorities going forward for early next week. As those plans begin to take shape later this week and early next week, they will be shared with you as quickly as possible. Until then, please be patient with us as there are many subjects to tackle.

In the next few days there may be a reluctance on the part of students to complete work because of this decision by the governor. Please be encouraging and understanding. This is different for everyone and difficult for most.
Hang in there. We will get through this together.

hr.p: Welcome to the 2019-20 school year. As you navigate through our website, we hope you find it to be informative, interesting, and easy to use.

We are proud of our facilities, our staff, and above all, our students. Our campus is beautiful, well maintained, and functional. Our staff is highly trained, dedicated, and eager to help our students. Our students come from diverse backgrounds, have different goals, and are individuals but they come together to have a great deal of pride in their school.
If you have any questions about our website or our district, feel free to call me between 8:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. at 419-661-6677 or send me an email at jwitt@lakeschools.org.
